00020 #ifndef NLX_EXTRACTOR

00030 #include <fstream>

00032 using namespace std;

00037 class NLXExtractor : public ifstream
00038 {
00039         public:
00054                 NLXExtractor(bool info,bool wideband,bool spots,bool events,bool timestamps,bool sync,bool restart,bool force,bool reverse,Time threshold,Time frameDuration) : info(info),wideband(wideband),spots(spots),events(events),timestamps(timestamps),sync(sync),restart(restart),force(force),reverse(reverse),threshold(threshold),frameDuration(frameDuration),ncsProvided(false),nvtProvided(false),nevProvided(false),nRestarts(0),syncsProvided(false),restartsProvided(false),restartsUndefined(true) { smiFiles.set(frameDuration); };
00058                 virtual ~NLXExtractor() { ncsFiles.close(); nvtFile.close(); nevFile.close(); };
00065                 virtual void init(char *inputs[],int nInputs,char *output) throw(NLXError);
00069                 virtual void extractWideband() throw(NLXError);
00073                 virtual void readSyncs(string filename) throw(NLXError);
00077                 virtual void findSyncs();
00081                 virtual void extractSpots() throw(NLXError);
00085                 virtual void syncSpots() throw(NLXError);
00089                 virtual void extractEvents() throw(NLXError);
00093                 virtual void readRestarts(string filename) throw(NLXError);
00097                 virtual void findRestarts();
00101                 virtual bool isRestart(Time gap,Time timestamp);
00105                 virtual void extract() throw(NLXError);
00109                 virtual void showFileHeaders();
00110 
00111         private:
00112 
00113                 // Which operations should be performed?
00114                 bool                                            info;
00115                 bool                                            wideband;
00116                 bool                                            spots;
00117                 bool                                            events;
00118                 bool                                            timestamps;
00119                 bool                                            sync;
00120                 bool                                            restart;
00121                 bool                                            force;
00122                 bool                                            reverse;
00123 
00124                 // Processing parameters
00125                 Time                                            threshold;
00126                 Time                                            frameDuration;
00127 
00128                 // Input and output files
00129                 string                                  basename;
00130                 bool                                            ncsProvided;    // ncs file(s) provided in command-line
00131                 bool                                            nvtProvided;    // nvt file provided in command-line
00132                 bool                                            nevProvided;    // nev file provided in command-line
00133                 bool                                            smiProvided;    // smi file(s) provided in command-line
00134                 NCSFileCollection       ncsFiles;
00135                 NVTFile                                         nvtFile;
00136                 SMIFileCollection               smiFiles;
00137                 NEVFile                                         nevFile;
00138                 OutputFile                              widebandFile;
00139                 OutputFile                              spotsFile;
00140                 OutputFile                              eventFile;
00141                 OutputFile                              spotsTimestampFile;
00142                 OutputFile                              ncsTimestampFile;
00143                 OutputFile                              nvtTimestampFile;
00144                 OutputFile                              nevTimestampFile;
00145                 OutputFile                              syncFile;
00146                 OutputFile                              restartFile;
00147 
00148                 // Sync info and restart events
00149                 Time                                            syncs[MAX_N_RESTARTS];
00150                 int                                             nSyncs;
00151                 Time                                            restarts[MAX_N_RESTARTS];
00152                 int                                             nRestarts;
00153                 bool                                            syncsProvided;                  // sync file provided in command-line
00154                 bool                                            restartsProvided;               // restart file provided in command-line
00155                 bool                                            restartsUndefined;      // restarts cannot be determined (no restart file, no nev file)
00156 };
